chapter.p: 44And Moses came, and he spokeOr “recited” all the words of this song in the ears of the people; that is, he and Joshua the son of Nun. 45And when Moses finished speakingLiterally “And he finished Moses to speak” all these words to all Israel, 46then he said to them, “Take to heart all the wordsLiterally “Put heart your to all the words” that I am admonishing against you todayLiterally “the day” concerning which you should instruct them with respect to your childrenOr “sons” so that they will observe diligentlyLiterally “to keep to do” all the words of this law, 47for it is not a trifling matter among you, but it is your life, and through this word you will live long in the landLiterally “you will make long days on the land” that you are about to cross the Jordan to get there to take possession of it.”

48And Yahweh said to Moses on exactly this day, saying,Literally “to say” 49“Go up to this mountain of the Abarim range, Mount Nebo, which is opposite Jericho,Literally “on the face of Jericho” and see the land of Canaan that I am giving to the IsraelitesLiterally “sons/children of Israel” as a possession. 50You shall die on that mountain that you are about to go up there, and you will be gathered to your people, just as your brother Aaron died on Mount HorLiterally “on Hor the mountain” and he was gathered to his people, 51because of the fact that you broke faith with me in the midst of Israel at the waters of Meribah Kadesh, in the desert of Zin, because you did not treat me as holyLiterally “that not you treated me as holy” in the midst of the Israelites.Literally “sons/children of Israel” 52Yes, from afar you may view the land, but there you shall not enter there, that is, into the land that I am giving to the Israelites.”Literally “sons/children of Israel”
